text_block_list.name: Matikanetannhauser
text_block_list.text:
Fwaaah~~... Rya?
Ah, good work, deshu, desuu...

text_block_list.name: Matikanetannhauser
text_block_list.text:
Nyaaah~... Last night, before bed,
I had a little incident, you see.

text_block_list.name: Matikanetannhauser
text_block_list.text:
What do you know, inside my hat,
...an eight-legged sergeant went "jajaaan".

text_block_list.name: Matikanetannhauser
text_block_list.text:
Uuu~... I wonder when it got in.
I'd like to be friends with real spiders too,
but that one was just too bold...

Due to the incident, it seems Matikanetannhauser
wasn't able to get proper rest.
